name: My Pandemic Life
description:
A little peep into normal people's lives during the Covid19 pandemic.

The game current has some issues as I am inexperienced at making webGL build, the problems are being fixed as we speak

Current known issues:

-Audio not playing 

-Credit screen UI problem
